website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for grain-free wet cat food by a top brand, this is a good choice and a close contender for the best.
pros: A grain-free recipe that doesn't contain artificial flavors, gluten, soy, or corn
Has a variety of seafood flavors the majority of cats love
cons: Mixed opinions on the juicy texture
A few reports of the cans being hard to open

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Hydrated, UTI Free
customer_reviews.text: Weebles has always had trouble keeping wet food down, so I stuck with dry kibble. After a bad UTI, I decided to try wet food again to keep him hydrated. Iams Perfect Portions was the answer. He gets Iams UTI Protection kibble in the AM and the 3.4 ounce wet in the evening. He just devours the wet and grazes on the kibble during the day while I'm at work. He's happy, healthy, and UTI free after six months. He hasn't had any emesis from Iams wet products. I'm a pharmacist in RL and understand nutrition and additives. He's doing great and I have zero questions about the goodness of Iams products. Ty Iams for keeping my best friend healthy.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Hate the new packaging. It is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Really cannot stand the new packaging on the iams cat food. It is too difficult to remove the top 9 year old my son is not able to do it to feed his cat and I cannot do it either due to and issues we basically need to cut it out with a sharp knife. I will not be buying this product in the future. I prefer the metal tins which we could recycle easily. Not all areas allow plastic recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT HATES IT AND SO DO I!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with IAMS piss poor substitute for the the salmon, chicken and fish pate that they used to sell. My cat hates this food AND it stinks to high heaven and looks like vomit. Did I mention that: (1) this costs me nearly twice as much because of the way it's packaged - for a month, I have to buy two cases of 18 (2) the little plastic and foil containers are hard to open without getting what's inside all over your hands - I MISS the small cans which were recyclable 3) IAMS don't you make enough money? Do you have to make your customers miserable along the way?
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I wish i liked the container as much as my cat likes the food
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the food, but i dislike these containers. Specifically, if there is a way to open these without getting stinky cat food on your hands, i haven't found it. It's also not uncommon to get sliced by the edge of the foil as you try to hold the container while you peel off the stubborn lid. That might just be my thin old-lady skin, but it's a safe bet that i'm not the only old lady with cats to feed. Really, as much as my cats loves this food, your ill-conceived peel-back lids are vexing enough to make me consider a change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the cans!!!
customer_reviews.text: I miss the cans! These new containers are an odd portion size. The cans were 3 oz and were easy to split up evenly. Also it is important to mention that the cost per ounce is higher with this new packaging. Less food for more money is not unnoticed. Bring back the cans!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisann247

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best portioned pate cat food
customer_reviews.text: My two cats INHALE this. We originally purchased for our older cat (12) who was losing weight. After taking him to the vet and clearing up a digestion issue we switched to this food from the prescription diet the vet had him on. He loves it and our younger cat literally begs us for it. He's gaining weight and is much happier. We have added this item to our subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portions
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Iams Perfect Portions soft cat food packs for my daughter's cat, Romeo. He's extremely old and recently had to have most of his teeth pulled. Romey is a picky eater, but he really only likes this brand of wet cat food. Since my daughter moved all the way across the country (from Florida to Washington state) ordering this through Amazon made it easy to send to my GrandfurBaby!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Arrived spoiled (edited)
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I was able to receive a replacement order swiftly. I don’t know how to contact the seller any other way. One of the two packages of the food arrived spoiled. Barely getting close to it, you smell an absolutely repugnant smell. The other one is just fine, but the second one I would never let my cat get near. The food is great for my cat, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Paty P

customer_reviews.title: The Cat is Happy
customer_reviews.text: The cat told me to say she loves her food and wishes I’d give her more of it. My review: I’ve never tasted it. But I assume it’s delicious because the cat yells at me and swats my legs when it’s eatin’ time. Then she inhales it in record time and begs for more. The smell isn’t great but it’s not strong and it’s cat food and one shouldn’t expect it to smell appetizing. I wish it cost a bit less.
customer_reviews.author: iGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Elderly Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Our Sr. cat started having issues with pooping on dry food. He's been on this food for a few months now and he seems to be doing better and prefers it over other options we've offered him.
customer_reviews.author: optimusm07

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Didn't Enjoy It
customer_reviews.text: First of all food is so personal to each cat. My cat didn't love this and wouldn't even touch the salmon flavor. Aside from that, the food came out gray. Both the salmon and the turkey were pretty gray. I am now feeding my new cat the Turkey pate for adult cats (orange labeling) and it is very pink through and through. This makes me wonder if something was wrong with the ones I bought on amazon. Overall, I like the aims food for cats, but this one I purchased on amazon didn't go so well.
customer_reviews.author: julie lavallee

customer_reviews.title: Food quality good
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the packaging is terrible. The quality of food is good. My 5 cats liked it. The packaging is a different story. I was late for a meeting had to feed my cats, tried to open the package and got splashed all over my shirt. I had to change my shirt. Err
customer_reviews.author: Rene S.

customer_reviews.title: Package came with a damaged pod..
customer_reviews.text: Like that they came in bulk, but one of the containers came broken and disgusting.. Makes me wonder if these aren't expired goods? Definitely will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly D Hansen

customer_reviews.title: FOOD CAME OPEN AND SPOILED
customer_reviews.text: The cat food arrived with the containers having burst open weeks if not months before delivery. The containers were seeping food and were covered with bugs and their larvae. The smell was horrific. I got a refund and will hereafter get my cat food from the store.
customer_reviews.author: AnHonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely LOVE it. They get so excited and dance around. I feed them dry cat food and just supplement their diet with the wet. They eat dry cat food just fine but they don’t get excited about it like they do this. It’s a little pricey but I love the portion size and easy to open packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mdc3

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and convenient, if a little pricey, but more importantly my cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can give a half portion because the princess only likes freshly opened food and doesn't eat that much in one sitting. Miss Picky Pants doesn't like any other flavor or brand so I hope they keep making this :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: So convenient! The smaller portions make it easier to feed the kittens we've adopted. They like the flavor, they both eat every morsel so i don't have left over cans of stinky wet cat food in the fridge. Will def more of these.
customer_reviews.author: UnSykik Mee

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it and eat it every day. Sometimes it frustratingly sticks inside the plastic package, but it's still easier to dispense than a can of course. Cardboard box is also frustrating to tear open, but minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. There is never a scrap of food left on the plate. It is especially good for my elderly shelter cat. He eats quickly and is prone to tossing food back up. He eats just as fast but the food stays with him. The portion sizes are good. I have used it for a couple of months and no sign the cats tiring of it. You know cats. Buy a case and suddenly they will not eat a bite. I haven't had that problem with the healthy cat by IAMS.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrie

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to open the rid, and the sauce spreads around the corner when you separate the two. The portion is super small, so I have to open three packages for one time. The quality of food is okey.
customer_reviews.author: snow

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the old stuff
customer_reviews.text: bring back the old cans. cat doesn't like whatever is in this
customer_reviews.author: danny e.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this product, so when I was about to run out, I ordered from Amazon Prime on Sunday, expecting delivery on Tu/Wed. But no, it will arrive 14 days later! A panicky order from Chewy.com on Thursday arrived today, Friday. Needless to say, Chewy.com will be my go-to for pet orders!
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Product amount not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Description reads... Contains Twenty Four (24) 2.6 Ounce. Twin Pack Trays (48 Servings Total) Of Iams Perfect Portions Healthy Grain Free Adult Wet Cat Food Paté Variety Pack: (12) Chicken And (12) Tuna Recipe. We received half of this amount.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for convenience and leaving for Cat sitters
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for when my friend watched my cat for 18 days! She wasn't about to spoil her in her routine like I do so these were convenient for opening, dumping, and throwing out
customer_reviews.author: Josie Lange

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it but portions small.
customer_reviews.text: The cats love it but the portion size are small. I had to give the cats 2. I think it’s price is bit high considering it only lasted 6 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer123

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it, me, not so much
customer_reviews.text: cat loves the food, but I find the packaging difficult to open by hand, the foil is very hard to pull open and the juices squirt opto your hands. I now use a knife to open the damn things. but my elderly Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only one cats will eat . I learn if animal will not eat , dose not mean they our picky just means they know something wrong
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Likes Them
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes them and I like that they are grain free. I wish the packaging wasn't plastic, but such is life.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves this catfood! I don’t like the price but since my cat likes it so much I keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S Rosenwald

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are two kinds and the portion size is perfect. Great quality, I will be getting monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N. Jonas

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been eating this food for the past 5 months and is always excited to eat. He is a picky eater and so far only likes 3 brands of food including this one. The plastic packaging is a slight downside as it produces a lot of waste, and I would prefer larger portion sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this catfood
customer_reviews.text: I just started my adult cats on this food and they really like. Chicken and tuna flavors so far I like the separate portions. Excellent packaging I will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cat hated this, and threw up what she ate.
customer_reviews.text: Mt 16 year old cat needs small cans of wet food. Unfortunately she didnt like these, and when she did eat them she vomited soon after. She prefers Sheba and BFF brands.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie U. Gruenberg

customer_reviews.title: Iams Perfect Portion Wet Cat Food is a great option for feeding multiple cats.
customer_reviews.text: The Iams perfect portions wet cat food is a good option for our two cats. The wet food in the morning and dry at night, helps balance their diets and controls their diets...and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: maribeth lisnock

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 cats love the Sheba perfect portions but they turn their noses up at these and will not eat them, what a waste of $s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, my food loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this pate cat food. In order for him to get every bite, I have to scoop it into a separate bowl.
customer_reviews.author: MAC123

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to open the package! Especially for us older folks
customer_reviews.text: The individual packaging is so hard to open it takes me forever and then the meat gets all over my fingers. Also would be nice to have a variety of textures as my cat gets bored with what’s available. She’s on a special diet so I appreciate having the product for her
customer_reviews.author: Jordan A.

customer_reviews.title: Picky Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the perfect portions by IAMS. They wipe their plates clean now! Happy Cats!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this, maybe not as much as they loved the paté.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Collector

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this! The packages are a little harder to open then the cans, but gets easier you learn how to open them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Reeve

customer_reviews.title: I love the small portions
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not like this, My Moms elderly cat liked it. Great for older cats who have dental problems. I love the small portion sizes
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Something on product
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this product. This particular shipment has something on the product and internal package. I took photos to share but don't see where I can add it for people to see.
customer_reviews.author: nh

customer_reviews.title: Purfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Purfect size! ;) But in all seriousness they are really convenient. Also it's nice that there are 2 different flavors instead of all one kind.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ellis

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: My cats both like this, and the portion is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very digestable
customer_reviews.text: My 15yo is getting fussy .. no upchecks w/ pate!
customer_reviews.author: CrossposterJulie

customer_reviews.title: My one cat just absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: My one cat absolutely loves it it’s for indoor cats
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Have too trick my cat 🐈 too eat it~!!? Shreds are the best for Ollie
customer_reviews.text: My Ollie cat 🐈 hates the Pate ~ have too mix my iams with canned food and next time order a different texture. Ollie Legit let the Pate rot & mold in his bowl otherwise 😾😿🙀😼
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it but 1 doesn’t seem to be enough
customer_reviews.author: john w. Hans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 2 cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it and I love the ease of opening one half for a meal. No messy containers left open for dogs or mice to get into.

customer_reviews.title: convenient and heathy
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. my adult male cat loves this good. I like the no mess, no waste part. I survive and save.
customer_reviews.author: rob a

customer_reviews.title: So far it is one of the few foods my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it is one of the few foods my fussy rescue will eat. Will buy again since he licked the plate clean today.
customer_reviews.author: DMFP

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are 2 packs. Portioned just right for my elderly cat.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: my cat did not like
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and it looked great but my cat would not eat at all. One stiff and walked away.
customer_reviews.author: devonwoodjrt

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't puke anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Seeing as how my Walmart doesn't carry the set anymore, this would do just a good. On a positive side, now I don't have to go there to get it.

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this stuff, now part of my monthly delivery

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. I can only find these flavors on line

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging - moldy food!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! 3 of the containers that I opened were unsealed and completely moldy. I had to trash the remaining food.
customer_reviews.author: Jadie

customer_reviews.title: Single servings ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the single servings. No waste and the the plus of an Iams product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Loranger

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Finicky cat was due for a new food richer in nutrients for older, indoor cats. We tried others. Iam’s was a hit. He has eagerlerly devoured all the flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved this food and because it’s portioned out there’s no ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this food and because it’s portioned out there’s no wasted food that needs to be tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, less waste, grain free!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this wet food and the small portions are perfect, they rarely waste any of it now! Plus I like that it's a grain free product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice to handle
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient to to use. It is not the pet's favorite.
customer_reviews.author: enerjoy

customer_reviews.title: which is good, because that means I don’t have to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this food so much she screams until I wake up and give her some every morning. There was a lot more of this cat food than I thought there was, which is good, because that means I don’t have to buy any for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly portioned for my indoor kitty. She loves the salmon. I purchase this for her once a month. Like this product a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Only received one pack instead of the two that is advertised. Disappointing!

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my kitties!
customer_reviews.text: My kitties LOVE this moist food! And my puppy LOVES to lick the empty bowls!

customer_reviews.title: Kitty won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: My kitty eats the dry food and loves it but he will not go anywhere near this wet food. It makes me so sad because I bought so much!
customer_reviews.author: seanna

customer_reviews.title: Iams perfect portion
customer_reviews.text: I have had cats on Iams cat food for over 30 years because I felt it was healthy for them. My cat will not touch the new Iams.

customer_reviews.title: I cat loves it

customer_reviews.title: why isn't it as described????
customer_reviews.text: The item was to be a split. Half tuna and half Salmon. Received all tuna. Why?????

customer_reviews.title: My picky cats LOVE this food!

product_meta.title: Iams Perfect Portions Healthy Grain Free Variety Pack Wet Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Pate| Flavor Name:Variety: Adult Chicken & Tuna| Size:(24) 2.6 oz.IAMS PERFECT PORTIONS Healthy Indoor Adult Cat Food Trays allow you to feed your cat wet food without the mess of leftovers in your refrigerator. IAMS Paté Chicken Recipe and IAMS Paté Tuna Recipe Variety Pack has the hearty cat food you and your cat love with its delectable balance of flavor and nutrition. Our wholesome cat patés are made with vitamin E to support a healthy immune system. Give your cat IAMS PERFECT PORTIONS Paté Grain Free Wet Cat Food so their cat food dish has a perfectly sized and fresh meal every time.
feature_bullets: Contains Twenty Four (24) 2.6 Ounce. Twin Pack Trays (48 Servings Total) Of Iams Perfect Portions Healthy Grain Free Adult Wet Cat Food Paté Variety Pack: (12) Chicken And (12) Tuna Recipe
These Iams Wet Adult Cat Food Patés Feature Two Individual Meals With A Wholesome, Grain Free Recipe To Keep Your Cat Satisfied Without Artificial Preservatives
Complete And Balanced For Adult Cat Maintenance And Wellness To Keep Your Cat Purring For A Lifetime Of Health And Fun
Supports A Healthy Immune System By Adding Vitamin E To Your Cat's Diet
Iams Perfect Portions Tray Provide Two Individually Sealed Meals, So Your Cat Gets A Fresh Meal Every Time And A Lifetime Of Health And Fun
